query:
INSERT INTO database_connections (name, databaseType, host, port, `database`, username, isActive, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES 
('Production MySQL', 'mysql', 'localhost', 3306, 'production_db', 'admin', 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Development PostgreSQL', 'postgresql', 'localhost', 5432, 'dev_db', 'developer', 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Test Database', 'mysql', '192.168.1.100', 3306, 'test_db', 'tester', 1, NOW(), NOW());
